name: Death In The Neighborhood
description:
Death's Key has split into several pieces!

In this VR low poly game, the player, Death, must do some community service to get the fragments of the Key back. Go on, go be the best Death you can be, so you can get home!

Death In The Neighborhood is available to play on:

  • Oculus Rift
  • HTC Vive
  • Valve Index
  • Windows Mixed Reality

Credits to the two sleep deprived Designers:
JimJim: James Justice
Snow: Aidan Neumann
